channel.title: list on Khaled Nassar
channel.description: Recent content in list on Khaled Nassar

item.title: Don't use Python List Everywhere
item.description: the common thing that if you wanna add some items to someplace may thinking to use List, that’s great python list has a lot of features that you need like mutable: you can add/delete what you want from the list ordered: the items have a defined order allowed duplicates: lists can have items with the same value so you will ask me a question if lists have something like that so why should I avoid it then?
